it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.model.action

Class TakeCardAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.model.action.Action
        • it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.model.action.TakeCardAction

  • public class TakeCardAction
extends Action
    Class that represent the action to take a card from a tower, both for "normal" actions and "bonus" actions
    Author:
    Luca Napoletano, Claudio Montanari

    • Constructor Detail

      • TakeCardAction

        public TakeCardAction(ActionType type,
                      Familiar familiar,
                      StaticList<TowerPosition> tablePosition,
                      int positionInTableList)
        Constructor for a normal action
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the action
        familiar - The familiar the player wants to move
        tablePosition - The StaticList of market position in table
        positionInTableList - The exact index of the chosen position
        Throws:
        NotEnoughResourcesException - Thrown if the player hasn't enough resources

      • TakeCardAction

        public TakeCardAction(ActionType type,
                      Player player,
                      StaticList<TowerPosition> tablePosition,
                      int positionInTableList,
                      int actionValue,
                      int actionIncrement)
        Constructor for bonus action
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the action
        player - The interested player
        tablePosition - The StaticList of market position in table
        positionInTableList - The exact index of the chosen position
        actionValue - The value of this bonus action
        actionIncrement - The increment of this bonus action
        Throws:
        NotEnoughResourcesException - Thrown if the player hasn't enough resources

    • Method Detail

      • checkAction

        public Response checkAction()
        Method used to check if this action can be applied. If the card as more cost, this method create a PayRequest
        Specified by:
        checkAction in class Action
        Returns:
        A response which represents the Success/Failure of the method: SUCCESS for a successful control, FAILURE for a generic problem, LOW_LEVEL if the player hasn't enough resources, CANNOT_PLAY if the player can not play this action

      • rollBackAction

        public void rollBackAction()
        Method used to undo a TakeCardAction
        Overrides:
        rollBackAction in class Action

      • doAction

        public void doAction()
        Method used to apply the action. If there were some PayRequest, apply it
        Specified by:
        doAction in class Action

      • checkMyFamiliar

        private boolean checkMyFamiliar()
        Private method used to check the familiar of the player, because the player can position only one of his familiars in the tower, apart the neutral familiar
        Returns:
        True if player can position his familiar in the specified position, otherwise False

      • isAnotherFamiliar

        private boolean isAnotherFamiliar()
        Method used to verify if the tower is occupied yet
        Returns:
        True if there is at least another familiar in tower (Not of the current player), otherwise False
